name: Rollersway
tag_list: social-network, online-community, sport, roller-skating, inline-skating, mobile-application
overview:
Rollersway.com is a social network for the roller-skating community with the aim to bring skaters “Rollers” together from all over the world and allow them to share their passion for skating.

Rollers can connect with other rollers and share videos, photos and events. Community members can also add their favourite places to skate on the map which allows others to find great places to skate around world.

Additionally, the Rollersway mobile application allows rollers to record their street skate including route information, speed and distance traveled. It is automatically uploaded as track to Rollersway.com which becomes visible to the wider community. Rollers can add additional information to the recorded track regarding surface quality and traffic conditions for skaters.
